titles.title: Hermosa Creek Watershed Protection Act of 2012
A bill to designate certain Federal land in the San Juan National Forest in the State of Colorado as wilderness, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

term.name: Wilderness and natural areas, wildlife refuges, wild rivers, habitats

bill.summary: 7/18/2012--Introduced. Hermosa Creek Watershed Protection Act of 2012 - Designates specified federal lands in San Juan National Forest as: (1) the Hermosa Creek Watershed and Protection Area, and (2) the Hermosa Creek Special Management Area. Designates specified land within the Protection Area as the Hermosa Creek Wilderness.
